set.name: DMR-23(Promos), DMX and DMD Revolution Final

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Fire or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more(When one of your fire or nature dragons that costs 5 or more attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, you may discard a fire and nature Dragon from your hand. If you do, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 8 or less and put it into its owner's graveyard. Then you may choose a player. That player shuffles all cards in their graveyard into their deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Your Dragons cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Light or Water Dragon that costs 5 or more(When one of your light or water dragons that costs 5 or more attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, until the start of your next turn, your creatures can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change - Light or Water creature (When one of your light or water creatures attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) When you put this creature into the battle zone, this turn, your opponent can't cast spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, draw a card. Then you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may cast a light spell that costs 5 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Light or Nature dragon that costs 5 or more(When one of your light or nature dragons that costs 5 or more attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your creatures would leave the battle zone, you may return 2 shields to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' abilities of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. Put it into your mana zone or add it to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} Quattro breaker(This creature breaks 4 shields) If you have 7 or more light or nature cards in your mana zone, this creature in your shields gets 'shield trigger'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into the mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, destroy another one of their creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may put a darkness or fire D2 Field from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 3 seals on it. Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures, your opponent put 2 seals on it. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, put 2 of your seals into your graveyard. Whenever you put a seal into a graveyard, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever your creatures battle, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard a card from your hand, and if that card is a creature the battling creature gets +5000 power. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution darkness creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Demon Commands. Triple breaker Whenever this creature attacks, put a non-evolution darkness creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. Then, you may put a darkness creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Angel Commands. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, draw 2 cards. Your opponent can't summon creatures that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. Your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked. Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts it into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a non-creature card that costs 6 or less, show that card to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then use that card from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a non-creature card that costs 6 or less, show that card to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then use that card from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Dragons. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, put a card in your opponent’s mana zone into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Dragons. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, put a card in your opponent’s mana zone into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero―If you have 6 or more Dragons in your graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero―If you have 6 or more Dragons in your graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Infinity Power Attacker(While attacking, this creatures has infinite power)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, if you have another Dragon in the battle zone, you may put each of your creatures on the bottom of your deck. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, if you have another Dragon in the battle zone, you may put each of your creatures on the bottom of your deck. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Chain Cascade(When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are creatures that cost less than this creature, you may put them into the battle zone. Put the rest of the cards on top of your deck in any order)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player puts all their cards in the battle zone, hand, shield zone and graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero―If you have an Angel Command Dragon in the battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. Your opponent can't cast spells until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Each player puts all their creatures in the battle zone that cost the same as or more than the number of cards in their mana zones on the bottom of their decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck.

Rules
property.value: Your opponent's cards are put into their mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Each turn, the first time this creature is tapped, untap it. Mana Arms 5: While this creatures battles, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +13000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, put an evolution creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​​ {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If there are Gods among these cards that are able to link with one of your Gods in the battle zone, you may put those Gods into the battle zone and link it with that God.(You may link more than 1 god)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon, put it into your hand. If its not a Dragon, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon.(Dragonoids don't count) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Giants cost may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. Saver: Giant(When one of your Giants would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put any number of cards from your hand into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, you may have the first light creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, you may have the first water creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Metamorph(If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following ability)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, destroy all creatures that have power 9000 or less. Whenever one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed by this creature, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise. put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite evolution Omega - Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of Guardian creatures from your graveyard, mana zone or battle zone. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead) Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and shuffle it into its owner's deck. While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead) When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge 3 times. Each time you win and reveal a creature, put that creature into the battle zone instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. Each time you win and reveal a spell, cast it for no cost instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you summon this creature into the battle zone, count the number of your opponent's shields and play that number of Gachinko Judge games. For each time you win Gachinko Judge in this way, put a Hunter from your graveyard, mana zone or hand into the battle zone.(Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent) Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. That player puts cards from the top of their deck into their graveyard until 2 creatures have been put into their graveyard in this way. (At the start of your game, separate your psychic creatures from your deck and put them into your hyperspatial zone. If a psychic creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return it to your hyperspatial zone)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. Then choose a creature that costs less than the discarded card in your graveyard and put it into the battle zone. Link Release(When this creature leaves the battle zone, return one of its psychic cells to your hyperspatial zone and flip the other cards)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Your opponent's cards are put into their mana zone tapped (At the start of your game, separate your psychic creatures from your deck and put them into your hyperspatial zone. If a psychic creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return it to your hyperspatial zone)

property.name: Rules

Add those shields to your opponent's hand. World breaker(This creature breaks all your opponent's shields) Link Release(When this creature leaves the battle zone, return one of its psychic cells to your hyperspatial zone and flip the other cards)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) This creature can attack untapped creatures on the turn you put it into the battle zone. If a psychic creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return it to your hyperspatial zone)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​​ {BLOCKER} Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. Then you may put up to 3 cards from your hand to your shields face down. When one of the opponent's creatures breaks one or more of your shields for the first time in a turn, each of your Light cards in those shields gets 'shield trigger'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy any number of your other creatures. For each creature destroyed, you may put a psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of your game, separate your psychic creatures from your deck and put them into your hyperspatial zone. If a psychic creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return it to your hyperspatial zone) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever one of your Dragons attack, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. When you would lose the game, or your opponent would win the game, destroy this creature instead. When this creature is destroyed, this turn, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, choose one of the following.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero―If you have 6 or more creatures in your graveyard, and you have no Crossfire, Millionaire in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Gravity Zero―If you have a creature that has Ryusei in its name and a creature that has Prin in its name in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields)

property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever you summon a dragon into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Each of your dragons get 'speed attacker' and 'slayer'. You may summon dragons from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have 7 or more cards in your hand during your turn, you may summon a Liquid People for no cost once per turn. At the end of each of your turns, draw a card for each of your tapped Liquid People in the battle zone.

You can't put other exile creatures that have 'Outlaw' in their name into the battle zone.

If you do, this turn, this creature gets 'triple breaker', and you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Triple breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then choose a card from your opponent's mana zone and put it into their graveyard. Whenever your opponent puts a card into their graveyard from anywhere, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Blocker This creature can't attack. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may summon an evolution creature that has 'Ballom' in its name from your graveyard into the battle zone for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. ⁥Double breaker Your opponent's creatures are put into the battle zone tapped. When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ⁥Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) At the end of your turn, if this creature attacked, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, the next fire dragon you summon may cost up to 5 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. When you put that creature into the battle zone, that creature gets 'speed attacker'. (A creature that has 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. ⁥Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change—Fire or Nature creature (When one of your fire or nature creatures attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets 'speed attacker' until the end of the turn. (A creature that has 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose one of the following: -Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. -Draw a card. Then you may cast a light or water spell that costs 5 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose one of the following: -Discard a card from your hand. Then draw 2 cards. -Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change—Fire dragon (When one of your fire dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) ⁥Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ⁥Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) During the turn this creature was put into the battle zone, this creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield. You may put a fire Command Dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose one of the following: -Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. -Draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a nature creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: All for One, Machine of D

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, choose a non-evolution water creature that costs up to 2 more than that creature and put it from your hand into the battle zone. ⁥Denjara Switch: When you put a creature into the battle zone and that creature triggers an ability, you may turn this D2 Field upside down for the rest of the game. If you do, trigger that creature's ability twice instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Revolution Change—Fire or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more. ⁥Triple breaker. Final Final Revolution: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you haven't used another 'Final Revolution' in this game, you may put any number of Team Hamukatsu from your hand into your mana zone. Break a shield for each card you put into your mana zone in this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose a non-evolution creature in your mana zone that costs less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone. If it's a fire or nature creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change—Light or Water creature (When one of your light or water creatures attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or water spell that costs 3 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ⁥Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) If you have a field in the battle zone, you may summon this creature from your graveyard.
